item.title: Fire Emblem Heroes data with rvest
item.description: Introduction In this post, we will attempt to collect some data about the mobile game Fire Emblem Heroes by Intelligent Systems and Nintendo. To do this, weâ€™ll use the rvest package to scrape data from the Fire Emblem Heroes gamepedia page (https://feheroes.gamepedia.com/Main_Page) Loading packages library("rvest") ## Warning: package 'rvest' was built under R version 3.4.4 Scraping data Fire Emblem Heroes is a tactical RPG game in which players compete against the AI by trying to defeat their teams, composed of up to four characters (heroes).

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
